title: Supreme Court Says Yeshiva University Must Allow L.G.B.T. Group as Case Proceeds
description: By a 5-to-4 vote, the court refused to block a trial judge’s ruling that required the university to recognize the group under New York City’s anti-discrimination law.
dc:creator: Adam Liptak
media:credit: Anna Moneymaker for The New York Times
media:description: The court’s order meant that the justices will not, for now, address the latest clash between anti-discrimination principles and claims of conscience.
